meta.title: ILLA Cloud
meta.description: ILLA Cloud is a low-code platform with react component libraries and database integrations to build AI native internal applications in minutes.

product.title: ILLA Cloud
product.description: ILLA Cloud is a low-code platform to accelerate internal tools development and help businesses save costs

easy-to-use.alt-1: ILLA Cloud's rich feature set includes pre-built templates, components, and integrations that expedite application development. These resources, combined with the platform's ability to seamlessly connect with external systems and APIs, allow for the rapid creation of internal tools, dashboards, and CRUD applications. This accelerates the delivery of solutions, streamlines workflows, and enables teams to focus on core business objectives.
easy-to-use.alt-2: Connect to any data source with ILLA Cloud
easy-to-use.alt-3: With our GPT-based AI assistant, you can input your requirements in natural language, and our assistant will generate SQL queries for you.
easy-to-use.alt-4: 1. By writing JavaScript, you dynamically control components properties, event handlers, actions and other settings.
easy-to-use.desc: ILLA Cloud's rich feature set includes pre-built templates, components, and integrations that allow for the rapid creation of internal tools, dashboards, and CRUD applications.
easy-to-use.title: ILLA Cloud

AI.title: Leading AI integrations
AI.desc: Integration with OpenAI, Hugging Face, Langchain, and more allows ILLA to offer enhanced AI capabilities. By leveraging these powerful AI services, you can build a wide range of functionalities to enhance your business or accelerate the development.

teamwork.title: Smooth and efficient teamwork
teamwork.desc: We allow multiple users to collaborate on applications in real-time. With synchronized editing capabilities, team members can simultaneously work on different aspects of the project, ensuring a fluid and productive workflow.

anyone-can-use.title: Anyone can build tools
anyone-can-use.desc: From designing front-end interfaces with drag-and-drop components to integrating with data sources and generating queries using AI assistance, ILLA provides a streamlined experience that removes unnecessary complexities. You don't need to be a tech expert to create your own applications.

deploy.title: Deploy with One-click
deploy.desc: With ILLA Cloud, you don't have to worry about the deployment and release process. Once you have finished editing your application in ILLA, simply click the deploy button, and ILLA will take care of the rest.

unlimited-viewer.title: Free for unlimited viewers
unlimited-viewer.desc: You can freely add an unlimited number of viewers at no extra cost. This means you only need to pay for the fees associated with your editor members. It allows you to accommodate a growing number of users without incurring additional expenses.

rapid.title: Rapid idea implementation
rapid.desc: When enterprises experience a high demand for internal tools during rapid growth, ILLA Cloud can significantly accelerate the development speed and quality of your internal applications. This helps expedite your company's growth by quickly addressing the tooling needs.

no-skill.title: No skill limitations for editors
no-skill.desc: With ILLA Cloud, any individual within the organization can build the tools they need without requiring specialized teams or technical skills. This empowers employees across various roles to create their own solutions, fostering innovation and productivity.

cost-reduce.title: Cost reduction
cost-reduce.desc: By leveraging ILLA Cloud, enterprises can allocate their time, workforce, and financial resources towards core business activities. This results in reduced costs as ILLA streamlines the development process, eliminates the need for specialized teams, and minimizes the investment required for tooling development.

faq.title: よく寄せられる質問
faq.description: 他に質問はありますか？<0>DiscordでILLAに聞いてみてください </0>

content.question: ILLAクラウドとは?
content.answer: ILLA Cloudは、ILLA BuilderとILLA Driveから複数の機能を継承したローコードプラットフォームです。 ユーザーがログインし、登録して機能にアクセスできるようにすることで、シームレスなエクスペリエンスを提供します。 ILLA Cloud を使用すると、内部ツール、ダッシュボード、CRUD (作成、読み取り、更新、削除) アプリケーションなどを簡単に構築できます。 このプラットフォームは、作業効率を大幅に向上させ、企業がコストを削減するのに役立ちます。

content.question: ILLA Cloud を使用できる人
content.answer: プロダクトマネージャー、フルスタック開発者、プロジェクトマネージャー、データアナリストのいずれでも... nynone は ILLA Cloud を使用してツールを構築することができます: ドラッグアンドドロップコンポーネントによるフロントエンドインターフェースの設計から、データソースとの統合、および AI アシスタントを使用したクエリの生成まで。 ILLAは、不必要な複雑性を排除する合理化された経験を提供します。 独自のアプリケーションを作成するために、技術の専門家である必要はありません。

content.question: ILLA Cloudを使ってどのようなアプリケーションを開発できますか?
content.answer: ILLA Cloud を使用すると、必要なアプリケーションを構築できます。 ダッシュボード、管理者パネル、CRUDアプリ、CRM、CMSなどの一般的に使用される内部ツールなど。 さらに、安定した拡散を使用したテキストツーイメージアプリケーションなど、AI アプリケーションを開発することができます。 Whisperを使用した音声からテキストへのアプリケーション、さらにはOpenAIのGPTモデルを埋め込んで、さまざまなタスクを完了するのに役立ちます。

content.question: ILLAはどのデータソースをサポートしていますか?
content.answer: ILLAは、PostgreSQL、MongoDB、REST API、GraphQL、Google Sheetなど、さまざまなデータソースとの統合をサポートしています。 コードを記述することなく、任意のデータソースにすばやく接続できるため、目的のデータにシームレスにアクセスできます。
